<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1/workspaces/{slug}/projects/{project_id}/issues/{issue_id}/comments/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve all comments for a work item.
